item.title: Publications
item.description: Ph.D. Thesis Here is my Ph.D. thesis manuscript. You can find the corresponding slides there, and a video recording of the defense itself there. Preprints Divol, V., Niles-Weed J., Pooladian A-A. (2024). Tight stability bounds for entropic Brenier maps. arxiv Arnal C., Cohen-Steiner D., Divol, V. (2023). Critical points of the distance function to a generic submanifold. arxiv Divol, V., Niles-Weed J., Pooladian A-A. (2022). Optimal transport map estimation in general function spaces.

item.title: Teaching
item.description: Algèbre linéaire (Automne 2023) Notes de cours (version modifiée du polycopié de Guillaume Legendre) Notes Some teaching notes on basic ML algorithms. Notes on boosting Notes on decision trees and random forests Mathematical Tools for Data Science (Spring 2022) In Spring 2021, I taught with Carlos Fernandez-Granda the Mathematical Tools for Data Science course in the Master’s in Data Science at NYU (DS-GA 1013). The full lecture notes can be found here.
